name: sonolus-snake-engine
description: My attempt at creating a snake game in sonolus
author: LBO44

scripts.static: sonolus-cli --build ./play && sonolus-cli --build ./watch && cp ./dist/EnginePlayData ./source/engines/SnakeEngine/playData && cp ./dist/EngineWatchData ./source/engines/SnakeEngine/watchData && cp ./dist/EngineConfiguration ./source/engines/SnakeEngine/configuration && cp ./dist/LevelData ./source/levels/snake/data && sonolus-pack && sonolus-generate-static -a https://lbo44.github.io/Sonolus-Snake-Engine/ && cp ./web/. -r ./static
